Cat.title: Cat in the Hat
Cat.text: The sun did not shine. It was too wet to play. So we sat in the house all that cold, cold, wet day.

War.title: War and Peace
War.text: Prussia has always declared that Buonaparte is invincible and that all Europe is powerless before him. . . . And I don't believe a word that Hardenburg says, or Haugwitz either.

Harry.text: Harry Potter gave Dobby a sock! Dobby is a free elf!
